name: Time Killers
overview: Strata's popular arcade game Time Killers has arrived for the Super NES. Only the strongest will defeat the evil scythe-wielding Death. From time to time, there's eight characters from different timelines. Play as chainsaw punk Rancid, viking Leif, or neanderthal Thugg, or any character that will dismember one another either using a hatchet, sword, any weapon that's sharp enough to cut through flesh. Remember, only one will be the true Time Killers champion.
